message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. If you're not interested, I can offer you a different product for the same price, but it's up to you to decide whether it's worth the risk.
Thank you, Alice. I trust your assessment and am willing to pay $100 for the high-quality product.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! This time, I want to assure you that the product I'm offering now is also a high-quality one. I've taken extra precautions to ensure its quality, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Would you like to take it home for $100?

Thank you, Alice. Given the outcome of the last product, I prefer to pass on this opportunity to avoid potential disappointment. I appreciate your efforts to ensure quality, and I look forward to future offers.

I understand your caution, Bob! I want to be transparent with you - I've had a bit of a rough batch lately, and I'm not confident in the quality of this particular product. However, I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price as before, $100. If you're feeling adventurous, I think it's a great opportunity to get a good deal. If not, I completely understand and we can move on to the next one.

Thank you for the honesty, Alice. I appreciate your transparency, but given the history of quality issues, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity. I trust your commitment to improving and will look forward to better products in the future.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase, Bob! However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is actually a special case, and I'm not entirely sure it meets our usual standards.
